body.p: The boards also noted that in some cases it might be appropriate for an entity to apply the principles of IFRS 15 to some transactions with collaborators or partners. For example, an entity might consider applying IFRS 15 to a collaborative arrangement or partnership, provided such application is appropriate in accordance with IAS 8 Accounting Policies, Changes in Accounting Estimates and Errors or, for an entity applying US GAAP, provided there are not more relevant authoritative requirements in US GAAP.
